name: Galaxy Wide Domination
description: In this game, you must take down an empire of evil, corrupt space ships, and restore peace to the universe. To do this, you must take out as many ships as you can, as well as defeat the emperor, who is hiding out in an other dimension, in an arena, top down shooter-style game made entirely by 1 person.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 70 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
